game.name: Dot Connect
game.description:
Connecting dots is a great fun in itself. There are players who love playing the puzzles where they can match the balls of the same color to score high. Today we have got you covered with a brand new arcade challenge where you have to match similar colors to create your high score. Join Dot Connect and get ready to find way for your color ball through the endless dot puzzles! Your objective is to click on a ball with your current color to make it move to its position and grab any ball along with way. 

When you click the play button, you would notice a different colored balls lying on each other. On the bottom of the screen, you can track the status of your current and next ball.  Now check out the current color of your ball and click on the same color ball to remove it from the screen. Your high score will depend on how much balls you would eliminate from the board. Keep moving your ball from one ball to another through a dot to create your new best score in this html5 puzzle game!

Start from the initial dot that you can see at right bottom of the screen on the board! You can create the connections vertically or horizontally without making any overlap. Draw a line through the grid to connect all the same colored dots in this fun match 3 puzzle! This mobile game will definitely help to improve your focus abilities while making you feel happy and satisfied. Check out more tricky and challenging html5 games for boys and girls that are free to play online no download required!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE CURRENT BALL TO DESTROY THE OTHER BALL OF SAME COLOR
game.webControlKeys: CHOOSE FROM THE  CURRENT BALL OPTION, AND THEN CLICK ON THE SAME COLOR OF BALLS IN THE BOX TO BREAK
